CustomField.description: Number of days it after build was complete for training to be completed
CustomField.formula:
If(ISNULL(Training_Complete_Date__c),
(today() - datevalue(Questionnaire_Reviewed_Date__c) - 2*( floor((today() - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((datevalue(Questionnaire_Reviewed_Date__c) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))),
(datevalue(Training_Complete_Date__c) - datevalue(Questionnaire_Reviewed_Date__c) - 2*( floor((datevalue(Training_Complete_Date__c) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((datevalue(Questionnaire_Reviewed_Date__c) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))))
CustomField.label: #Days Training
